name: Daze
description:
A Yume Nikki fan game made for the Dream Diary Jam 2018.

A game by the name, Daze or Da-Ze which follows the 'story' of someone called Nio. You go to sleep and get effects, and voila. You finished.

There are only 3 effects, so it would warrant only 30 minutes maximum to finish. If you know what you're doing, even less time is needed.

Contact me if there are bugs, or errors in-game.

Music by Rindre, and Sprites by Chalkflower.

This isn't finished in any way. This is all I can scrap together in a month.
